Testing GitHub Flavored Markdown

Published at October 10, 2015

Categories
jekyll

Jekyll is simple but powerfull, and can hosted easely on github. This is cheat codes for creating beautiful article with GFM (Github Flavored Markdown). For more information about GFM, click here.

# Links

Example :

click here.

Return :

# italic

Example :

this is italic !

Return :

# bold

Example :

this is bold !

Return :

# List

Example :

  • Item 1
  • Item 2
  • Item 3

Return :

# code

Example :

Return :

# code (inline)

Example :

echo "Hello World!";

Return :

# code (with highlight)

Example :

Return :
